title: Fitness Center, Faux Wood Flooring, On-Site Laundry Facilities
posting_body: ['Infinity Flats', 'Completely remodeled in September 2011, Infinity Flats offers large one and two-bedroom apartments loaded with brand new black appliances, hardwood floors, and fire places.', 'Relax by the resort style pool, soak in the outdoor hot tub, exercise in the state of the art fitness center, play fetch with Fido in the custom dog park, or simply unwind by your wood burning fireplace.', 'Infinity Flats is located just east of Cherry Creek Mall, providing easy access to some of Denver’s best shopping, dining, and entertainment.', 'The Colorado Blvd Light Rail Station is less than a mile away, offering convenient access to downtown Denver, Mile High Stadium, The Pepsi Center, and the Tech Center.', 'Window Coverings', 'Air Conditioner', 'Refrigerator', 'Vaulted Ceilings', 'Fireplace', 'Dishwasher', 'Dog Park with "Doggy Pool"', 'Faux Wood Flooring', 'Cable/Internet Ready', 'Hot Tub', 'Patio / Balcony', 'Picnic / Barbecue Area', 'Call:', 'show contact info', 'For more information, visit us at: <URL>']
